","descriptionType":"text/html","publishedDate":"Tue, 08 Mar 2022 01:30:18 +0000","feedId":77,"bgimg":"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-68bdbacb9254cb15482a5146ddf18a58_720w.jpg?rss","linkMd5":"84074fb8eef6048912c11b637be8e5f6","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn65@2020_3/2022/03/14/08-27-00-608_7ce5b3895efa78b3.webp","destWidth":720,"destHeight":481,"sourceBytes":135926,"destBytes":66492,"author":"卫小妖GOGOGO","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-68bdbacb9254cb15482a5146ddf18a58_720w.jpg?rss":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn65@2020_3/2022/03/14/08-27-00-608_7ce5b3895efa78b3.webp","https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0a47cb78b3e8fb29dc00d5838b90c547_720w.jpg?rss":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn72@2020_4/2022/03/14/08-27-12-980_4eb52d4441e796e8.webp","https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-2e5effcf113ebc191da3d97ec23b5106_720w.jpg?rss":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cdn16@2020_3/2022/03/14/08-27-10-119_e16379c6f2301fdd.webp","https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-8b29aa05ec9866efd57e40373dcccc98_720w.jpg?rss":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cdn100@2020_1/2022/03/14/08-27-05-416_6a7131f6c5e08d98.webp","https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-06e10132b3032cf958e177a3fc5e42d1_720w.jpg?rss":null,"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-7d02b97d2307b32416480b244e788628_720w.jpg?rss":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cdn86@2020_5/2022/03/14/08-27-04-863_8cddea7af22e75fc.webp","https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-dc01cc765e840dd34301b892bd0583dd_720w.jpg?rss":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn81@2020_5/2022/03/14/08-27-13-208_c563e8fb86d39e88.webp","https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d1d51e39964c51bc9777131e43cc2ec4_720w.jpg?rss":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx19/cdn86@2020_3/2022/03/14/08-27-07-600_0f5e0b5b02e47c70.webp","https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-23dc82e954d5e453c1952fd145895a69_720w.jpg?rss":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn45@2020_1/2022/03/14/08-27-11-905_1fb0ee15c0a3862f.webp","https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-864e2ff4b7a30b1879adffda69c536e3_720w.jpg?rss":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cdn66@2020_4/2022/03/14/08-27-04-040_8d353c710758066f.webp","https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-ca761e27c08d4eab75dc67e2d3af7cba_720w.jpg?rss":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn90@2020_3/2022/03/14/08-27-06-786_ba5bf9ac29dad05d.webp","https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-eb9f8d45a09c46f923cbdfdafafef5ba_720w.jpg?rss":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn72@2020_6/2022/03/14/08-27-09-423_807ae54e3157df3b.webp","https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-132cc713e6ac9fed1d3be15e20ca8271_720w.jpg?rss":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn82@2020_6/2022/03/14/08-27-18-196_e65e85655320a170.webp","https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d86672a117a0f85395a2dbc78ce95035_720w.jpg?rss":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx22/cdn4@2020_6/2022/03/14/08-27-08-207_b727ce1893b641d5.webp","https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-afd333caa845871e9d54b526d255054d_720w.jpg?rss":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn82@2020_5/2022/03/14/08-27-16-191_669f66e27637050c.webp","https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-339b8e35115befc6335b5381fd1146ce_720w.jpg?rss":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn94@2020_3/2022/03/14/08-27-07-729_8ffd15f0ea3841cd.webp","https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-f19f7b8ccb5ebd88ab2535375b4f303e_720w.jpg?rss":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn26@2020_1/2022/03/14/08-27-02-842_96ca40ae7b607da8.webp","https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-f32a28a3a474783e7f8af143d5b6f438_720w.jpg?rss":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cdn54@2020_3/2022/03/14/08-27-13-894_d32c80e0ae4ca8da.webp","https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-be608e8ee6f36eacbb1153336e60fab6_720w.jpg?rss":null,"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-86529dc304c155eb5e53090cf6386bce_720w.jpg?rss":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn70@2020_4/2022/03/14/08-27-06-144_f0490aaacb2e856b.webp","https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-4905394d7599d306127abd5cf664e6f0_720w.jpg?rss":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn73@2020_2/2022/03/14/08-27-11-654_dade91dfff432c04.webp","https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-b0605ab95a24ad70fad2e8e013cf900b_720w.jpg?rss":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn37@2020_2/2022/03/14/08-27-11-574_4bd1a3064b0b4f7d.webp","https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-4b28cae476cc2eb173c524f3c74d7f22_720w.jpg?rss":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn16@2020_3/2022/03/14/08-27-04-593_51674c47c382ce53.webp","https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-36b45294de527c9c2c197da9ca5ced39_720w.jpg?rss":null,"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-4c22efa00cb48928098aaa6217955aa8_720w.jpg?rss":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn19@2020_3/2022/03/14/08-27-05-536_6ce3242cce2bce0d.webp","https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-61fd0e0e76458ea5630d7b83a5f84ae0_720w.jpg?rss":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn6@2020_4/2022/03/14/08-27-12-672_e89bbbd805007919.webp","https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b7fe5de1feeb7a76728474a87555c98a_720w.jpg?rss":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cdn66@2020_2/2022/03/14/08-27-08-308_cf2d3bd3cbdd11b6.webp","https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-60340bc00614987e392e4a1054eb4c18_720w.jpg?rss":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn85@2020_5/2022/03/14/08-27-12-601_c9282b580dde37d2.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1647246419491},{"createdTime":"2022-03-14 16:26:59","updatedTime":"2022-03-14 16:26:59","title":"使用SEC 10K/Q提取企业历史总部所在地（州）","link":"http://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/165208303","description":"<h2>背景</h2><p data-pid=\"fkjZMInj\">在 Compustat 数据库里，企业的总部所在地（州）并不是历史记录，而是当前的数据（储存在<code>comp.company</code>里。也就是说，若一个公司调整了其总部坐在地（或者其他信息），所有的历史记录都会被更新。这样一来如果要在模型里加入总部所在地的固定效应，或者要去匹配当地的经济/人口信息时，就会有误差。</p><p data-pid=\"HmSanZVA\">要解决这个问题，通行的办法是利用企业的历史SEC 10K/Q filings来提取历史总部所在地。我的博客 <a href=\"https://link.zhihu.com/?target=https%3A//mingze-gao.com/posts/textual-analysis-on-sec-filings/\" class=\" wrap external\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noreferrer\">Textual Analysis on SEC Filings</a> 给出了从头开始做这件事的步骤和代码。如果需要编译好的数据集，University of Notre Dame 的 Software Repository for Accounting and Finance 提供了一个 <a href=\"https://link.zhihu.com/?target=https%3A//sraf.nd.edu/data/augmented-10-x-header-data/\" class=\" wrap external\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noreferrer\">augmented 10-X header dataset</a>。</p><p data-pid=\"kwkcD1t8\">基于这个数据集我快速地算了一些统计数据：每年约有<b>2-3%</b>的Compustat企业调整了他们的总部所在地（州）。在17221个公司里，2947个（17%）至少调整过一次总部所在地。这不是一个可以忽略的小数字。</p><h2>如何得到企业的历史总部所在地（1969-2018）?</h2><p data-pid=\"5isnoA-A\">这个问题分两个时间段。1969年到2003年的数据可以使用 <a href=\"https://link.zhihu.com/?target=https%3A//academic.oup.com/rfs/article-abstract/33/2/644/5522377\" class=\" wrap external\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noreferrer\">Bai, Fairhurst and Serfling (2020 RFS)</a>。作者们在94年之后使用了SEC fillings，94年之前则人工收集于 Moody’s Manuals (later Mergent Manuals) 和 Dun &amp; Bradstreet’s Million Dollar Directory (later bought by Mergent)。在他们 115,432 firm-year 的样本里, 1969年到2003年, 9,847 (87.50%) 从未搬过总部，1,211 (10.76%) 搬过一次，178 (1.58%) 搬过两次，18 (0.16%) 搬过三次。</p><p data-pid=\"z1NVj4aU\">1994年到2018年的数据我手动从 <a href=\"https://link.zhihu.com/?target=https%3A//sraf.nd.edu/data/augmented-10-x-header-data/\" class=\" wrap external\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noreferrer\">augmented 10-X header dataset</a> 里提取。首先跑一下这个Python脚本：</p><div class=\"highlight\"><pre><code class=\"language-python\"><span class=\"kn\">import</span> <span class=\"nn\">pandas</span> <span class=\"kn\">as</span> <span class=\"nn\">pd</span>\n\n<span class=\"n\">filepath</span> <span class=\"o\">=</span> <span class=\"s2\">&#34;~/Downloads/LM_EDGAR_10X_Header_1994_2018.csv&#34;</span>\n\n<span class=\"k\">if</span> <span class=\"vm\">__name__</span> <span class=\"o\">==</span> <span class=\"s2\">&#34;__main__&#34;</span><span class=\"p\">:</span>\n\n    <span class=\"n\">df</span> <span class=\"o\">=</span> <span class=\"n\">pd</span><span class=\"o\">.</span><span class=\"n\">read_csv</span><span class=\"p\">(</span>\n        <span class=\"n\">filepath</span><span class=\"p\">,</span>\n        <span class=\"n\">usecols</span><span class=\"o\">=</span><span class=\"p\">[</span><span class=\"s2\">&#34;cik&#34;</span><span class=\"p\">,</span> <span class=\"s2\">&#34;file_date&#34;</span><span class=\"p\">,</span> <span class=\"s2\">&#34;ba_state&#34;</span><span class=\"p\">],</span>\n        <span class=\"n\">dtype</span><span class=\"o\">=</span><span class=\"p\">{</span><span class=\"s2\">&#34;cik&#34;</span><span class=\"p\">:</span> <span class=\"nb\">str</span><span class=\"p\">},</span>\n        <span class=\"n\">parse_dates</span><span class=\"o\">=</span><span class=\"p\">[</span><span class=\"s2\">&#34;file_date&#34;</span><span class=\"p\">],</span>\n    <span class=\"p\">)</span>\n    <span class=\"c1\"># Some `ba_stata` codes are lowercase</span>\n    <span class=\"n\">df</span><span class=\"p\">[</span><span class=\"s2\">&#34;ba_state&#34;</span><span class=\"p\">]</span> <span class=\"o\">=</span> <span class=\"n\">df</span><span class=\"p\">[</span><span class=\"s2\">&#34;ba_state&#34;</span><span class=\"p\">]</span><span class=\"o\">.</span><span class=\"n\">str</span><span class=\"o\">.</span><span class=\"n\">upper</span><span class=\"p\">()</span>\n    <span class=\"c1\"># Some  `ba_state` codes are not valid US states</span>\n    <span class=\"n\">df</span> <span class=\"o\">=</span> <span class=\"n\">df</span><span class=\"p\">[</span><span class=\"n\">df</span><span class=\"p\">[</span><span class=\"s2\">&#34;ba_state&#34;</span><span class=\"p\">]</span><span class=\"o\">.</span><span class=\"n\">str</span><span class=\"o\">.</span><span class=\"n\">isalpha</span><span class=\"p\">()</span> <span class=\"o\">&amp;</span> <span class=\"o\">~</span><span class=\"n\">pd</span><span class=\"o\">.</span><span class=\"n\">isnull</span><span class=\"p\">(</span><span class=\"n\">df</span><span class=\"p\">[</span><span class=\"s2\">&#34;ba_state&#34;</span><span class=\"p\">])]</span>\n    <span class=\"n\">df</span><span class=\"o\">.</span><span class=\"n\">drop_duplicates</span><span class=\"p\">()</span><span class=\"o\">.</span><span class=\"n\">to_stata</span><span class=\"p\">(</span>\n        <span class=\"s2\">&#34;~/Downloads/historical_state_1994_2018.dta&#34;</span><span class=\"p\">,</span>\n        <span class=\"n\">write_index</span><span class=\"o\">=</span><span class=\"bp\">False</span><span class=\"p\">,</span>\n        <span class=\"n\">convert_dates</span><span class=\"o\">=</span><span class=\"p\">{</span><span class=\"s2\">&#34;file_date&#34;</span><span class=\"p\">:</span> <span class=\"s2\">&#34;td&#34;</span><span class=\"p\">},</span>\n    <span class=\"p\">)</span></code></pre></div><p data-pid=\"GhKgCUIE\">然后把导出的STATA数据集上传到WRDS Cloud上，跑一下这个SAS脚本：</p><div class=\"highlight\"><pre><code class=\"language-sql\"><span class=\"n\">libname</span> <span class=\"n\">hs</span> <span class=\"s2\">&#34;~/historical_state&#34;</span><span class=\"p\">;</span>\n\n<span class=\"cm\">/* Historical HQ state (1994 to 2018) from augmented 10-X header dataset */</span>\n<span class=\"n\">proc</span> <span class=\"n\">import</span> <span class=\"n\">datafile</span><span class=\"o\">=</span><span class=\"s2\">&#34;~/historical_state/historical_state_1994_2018.dta&#34;</span>\n\t<span class=\"k\">out</span><span class=\"o\">=</span><span class=\"n\">historical_state_1994_2018</span> <span class=\"n\">dbms</span><span class=\"o\">=</span><span class=\"n\">stata</span> <span class=\"k\">replace</span><span class=\"p\">;</span>\n<span class=\"cm\">/* Historical HQ state (1969 to 2003) from Bai, Fairhurst and Serfling (2020 RFS) */</span>\n<span class=\"n\">proc</span> <span class=\"n\">import</span> <span class=\"n\">datafile</span><span class=\"o\">=</span><span class=\"s2\">&#34;~/historical_state/hist_headquarters_Bai_et_al.dta&#34;</span>\n\t<span class=\"k\">out</span><span class=\"o\">=</span><span class=\"n\">hist_headquarters_Bai_et_al</span> <span class=\"n\">dbms</span><span class=\"o\">=</span><span class=\"n\">stata</span> <span class=\"k\">replace</span><span class=\"p\">;</span>\n\n<span class=\"cm\">/* Build the post-1994 dataset using SEC filings */</span>\n<span class=\"n\">proc</span> <span class=\"k\">sql</span><span class=\"p\">;</span>\n<span class=\"k\">create</span> <span class=\"k\">table</span> <span class=\"n\">funda</span> <span class=\"k\">as</span> \n<span class=\"k\">select</span> <span class=\"n\">gvkey</span><span class=\"p\">,</span> <span class=\"n\">cik</span><span class=\"p\">,</span> <span class=\"n\">datadate</span><span class=\"p\">,</span> <span class=\"n\">fyear</span> <span class=\"k\">from</span> <span class=\"n\">comp</span><span class=\"p\">.</span><span class=\"n\">funda</span>\n<span class=\"k\">where</span> <span class=\"n\">indfmt</span><span class=\"o\">=</span> <span class=\"s1\">&#39;INDL&#39;</span> <span class=\"k\">and</span> <span class=\"n\">datafmt</span><span class=\"o\">=</span><span class=\"s1\">&#39;STD&#39;</span> <span class=\"k\">and</span> <span class=\"n\">popsrc</span><span class=\"o\">=</span><span class=\"s1\">&#39;D&#39;</span> <span class=\"k\">and</span> <span class=\"n\">consol</span><span class=\"o\">=</span><span class=\"s1\">&#39;C&#39;</span>\n<span class=\"k\">and</span> <span class=\"k\">year</span><span class=\"p\">(</span><span class=\"n\">datadate</span><span class=\"p\">)</span> <span class=\"k\">between</span> <span class=\"mi\">1994</span> <span class=\"k\">and</span> <span class=\"mi\">2018</span>\n<span class=\"cm\">/* &#34;For firms that change fiscal year within a calendar year, \n</span><span class=\"cm\">\twe take the last reported date when extracting financial data. \n</span><span class=\"cm\">\tThis leaves us with one set of observations for each firm (gvkey) in each year.&#34; \n</span><span class=\"cm\">\t-- Pelueger, Siriwardane and Sunderam (2020 QJE) */</span>\n<span class=\"k\">group</span> <span class=\"k\">by</span> <span class=\"n\">gvkey</span><span class=\"p\">,</span> <span class=\"n\">fyear</span> <span class=\"k\">having</span> <span class=\"n\">datadate</span><span class=\"o\">=</span><span class=\"k\">max</span><span class=\"p\">(</span><span class=\"n\">datadate</span><span class=\"p\">);</span>\n\n<span class=\"k\">create</span> <span class=\"k\">table</span> <span class=\"n\">firm_historical_state</span> <span class=\"k\">as</span> \n<span class=\"k\">select</span> <span class=\"n\">a</span><span class=\"p\">.</span><span class=\"o\">*</span><span class=\"p\">,</span> <span class=\"n\">b</span><span class=\"p\">.</span><span class=\"n\">ba_state</span> <span class=\"k\">as</span> <span class=\"n\">state_sec</span> <span class=\"n\">label</span><span class=\"o\">=</span><span class=\"s2\">&#34;State from SEC filings&#34;</span>\n<span class=\"k\">from</span> <span class=\"n\">funda</span> <span class=\"k\">as</span> <span class=\"n\">a</span> <span class=\"k\">left</span> <span class=\"k\">join</span> <span class=\"n\">historical_state</span> <span class=\"k\">as</span> <span class=\"n\">b</span> \n<span class=\"k\">on</span> <span class=\"n\">a</span><span class=\"p\">.</span><span class=\"n\">cik</span><span class=\"o\">=</span><span class=\"n\">b</span><span class=\"p\">.</span><span class=\"n\">cik</span> <span class=\"k\">and</span> <span class=\"k\">year</span><span class=\"p\">(</span><span class=\"n\">a</span><span class=\"p\">.</span><span class=\"n\">datadate</span><span class=\"p\">)</span><span class=\"o\">=</span><span class=\"k\">year</span><span class=\"p\">(</span><span class=\"n\">b</span><span class=\"p\">.</span><span class=\"n\">file_date</span><span class=\"p\">)</span> <span class=\"k\">and</span> <span class=\"n\">b</span><span class=\"p\">.</span><span class=\"n\">file_date</span><span class=\"o\">&lt;=</span><span class=\"n\">a</span><span class=\"p\">.</span><span class=\"n\">datadate</span>\n<span class=\"k\">group</span> <span class=\"k\">by</span> <span class=\"n\">a</span><span class=\"p\">.</span><span class=\"n\">gvkey</span><span class=\"p\">,</span> <span class=\"n\">a</span><span class=\"p\">.</span><span class=\"n\">datadate</span>\n<span class=\"cm\">/* use the SEC filing closet to and before the Compustat datadate */</span>\n<span class=\"k\">having</span> <span class=\"n\">b</span><span class=\"p\">.</span><span class=\"n\">file_date</span><span class=\"o\">=</span><span class=\"k\">max</span><span class=\"p\">(</span><span class=\"n\">b</span><span class=\"p\">.</span><span class=\"n\">file_date</span><span class=\"p\">);</span>\n\n<span class=\"k\">create</span> <span class=\"k\">table</span> <span class=\"n\">historical_state_1994_2018</span> <span class=\"k\">as</span>\n<span class=\"k\">select</span> <span class=\"n\">a</span><span class=\"p\">.</span><span class=\"o\">*</span><span class=\"p\">,</span> <span class=\"n\">b</span><span class=\"p\">.</span><span class=\"k\">state</span> <span class=\"k\">as</span> <span class=\"n\">state_comp</span> <span class=\"n\">label</span><span class=\"o\">=</span><span class=\"s2\">&#34;State from Compustat&#34;</span>\n<span class=\"k\">from</span> <span class=\"n\">firm_historical_state</span> <span class=\"k\">as</span> <span class=\"n\">a</span> <span class=\"k\">left</span> <span class=\"k\">join</span> <span class=\"n\">comp</span><span class=\"p\">.</span><span class=\"n\">company</span> <span class=\"k\">as</span> <span class=\"n\">b</span> \n<span class=\"k\">on</span> <span class=\"n\">a</span><span class=\"p\">.</span><span class=\"n\">gvkey</span><span class=\"o\">=</span><span class=\"n\">b</span><span class=\"p\">.</span><span class=\"n\">gvkey</span>\n<span class=\"k\">order</span> <span class=\"k\">by</span> <span class=\"n\">a</span><span class=\"p\">.</span><span class=\"n\">gvkey</span><span class=\"p\">,</span> <span class=\"n\">a</span><span class=\"p\">.</span><span class=\"n\">datadate</span><span class=\"p\">;</span>\n<span class=\"n\">quit</span><span class=\"p\">;</span>\n\n<span class=\"cm\">/* Sanity check: no duplicated gvkey-fyear */</span>\n<span class=\"n\">proc</span> <span class=\"n\">sort</span> <span class=\"k\">data</span><span class=\"o\">=</span><span class=\"n\">historical_state_1994_2018</span> <span class=\"n\">nodupkey</span><span class=\"p\">;</span> <span class=\"k\">by</span> <span class=\"n\">gvkey</span> <span class=\"n\">datadate</span><span class=\"p\">;</span> <span class=\"n\">run</span><span class=\"p\">;</span>\n\n\n<span class=\"n\">proc</span> <span class=\"k\">sql</span><span class=\"p\">;</span>\n<span class=\"k\">create</span> <span class=\"k\">table</span> <span class=\"n\">hist_headquarters_Bai_et_al</span> <span class=\"k\">as</span> \n<span class=\"k\">select</span> <span class=\"n\">put</span><span class=\"p\">(</span><span class=\"n\">gvkeyn</span><span class=\"p\">,</span> <span class=\"n\">z6</span><span class=\"p\">.)</span> <span class=\"k\">as</span> <span class=\"n\">gvkey</span><span class=\"p\">,</span> <span class=\"n\">fyear</span><span class=\"p\">,</span> <span class=\"k\">state</span> \n<span class=\"k\">from</span> <span class=\"n\">hist_headquarters_Bai_et_al</span><span class=\"p\">;</span>\n<span class=\"n\">quit</span><span class=\"p\">;</span>\n\n<span class=\"cm\">/* Stack together the two datasets */</span>\n<span class=\"k\">data</span> <span class=\"n\">states</span><span class=\"p\">;</span> \n<span class=\"k\">set</span> <span class=\"n\">hist_headquarters_Bai_et_al</span> \n\t<span class=\"n\">historical_state_1994_2018</span><span class=\"p\">(</span><span class=\"k\">where</span><span class=\"o\">=</span><span class=\"p\">(</span><span class=\"n\">fyear</span><span class=\"o\">&gt;</span><span class=\"mi\">2003</span><span class=\"p\">)</span> <span class=\"n\">keep</span><span class=\"o\">=</span><span class=\"n\">gvkey</span> <span class=\"n\">fyear</span> <span class=\"k\">state</span><span class=\"p\">:);</span>\n<span class=\"n\">run</span><span class=\"p\">;</span>\n\n<span class=\"n\">proc</span> <span class=\"k\">sql</span><span class=\"p\">;</span>\n<span class=\"k\">create</span> <span class=\"k\">table</span> <span class=\"n\">hs</span><span class=\"p\">.</span><span class=\"n\">corrected_hist_state_1969_2018</span> <span class=\"k\">as</span> \n<span class=\"k\">select</span> <span class=\"o\">*</span><span class=\"p\">,</span> <span class=\"n\">coalesce</span><span class=\"p\">(</span><span class=\"k\">state</span><span class=\"p\">,</span> <span class=\"n\">state_sec</span><span class=\"p\">,</span> <span class=\"n\">state_comp</span><span class=\"p\">)</span> <span class=\"k\">as</span> <span class=\"n\">corrected_state</span>\n<span class=\"k\">from</span> <span class=\"n\">states</span> <span class=\"k\">where</span> <span class=\"k\">not</span> <span class=\"n\">missing</span><span class=\"p\">(</span><span class=\"n\">calculated</span> <span class=\"n\">corrected_state</span><span class=\"p\">)</span>\n<span class=\"k\">order</span> <span class=\"k\">by</span> <span class=\"n\">gvkey</span><span class=\"p\">,</span> <span class=\"n\">fyear</span><span class=\"p\">;</span>\n<span class=\"n\">quit</span><span class=\"p\">;</span>\n\n<span class=\"cm\">/* Sanity check: no duplicated gvkey-fyear */</span>\n<span class=\"n\">proc</span> <span class=\"n\">sort</span> <span class=\"k\">data</span><span class=\"o\">=</span><span class=\"n\">hs</span><span class=\"p\">.</span><span class=\"n\">corrected_hist_state_1969_2018</span> <span class=\"n\">nodupkey</span><span class=\"p\">;</span> <span class=\"k\">by</span> <span class=\"n\">gvkey</span> <span class=\"n\">fyear</span><span class=\"p\">;</span> <span class=\"n\">run</span><span class=\"p\">;</span></code></pre></div><h2>下载数据</h2><p data-pid=\"PlTW5EIa\">如果你也需要这个数据的话，可以来我的网站下载。</p><a 10:43:27 +0000","feedId":77,"bgimg":"","linkMd5":"b06dddbb609ebd032316df3e30fba552","bgimgJsdelivr":"","metaImg":"","author":"知乎用户（登录查看详情）","publishedOrCreatedDate":1647246419522},{"createdTime":"2022-03-14 16:26:59","updatedTime":"2022-03-14 16:26:59","title":"如何评价游戏《SIFU》（师父）的结局？","link":"http://www.zhihu.com/question/516125655/answer/2367773891","description":"<p data-pid=\"_aHKkwiU\">大家好，我们是《师父》的开发团队Slocap，出于对中国功夫与中华文化的敬意与热爱，我们团队用心创作了《师父》这款游戏，真诚地希望你们能够喜欢！我们也将认真听取你们的反馈，尽最大努力改进游戏！ </p><p data-pid=\"3Vphr99Q\">《师父》是一款以中国风作为设计主题、中国城市作为游戏背景、中国功夫白眉拳作为基础战斗风格的动作冒险游戏。玩家将扮演一位踏上复仇之路的功夫学徒，独自一人闯入危机四伏的现代江湖。 我们渴望创造出一场真正具有沉浸感的中国功夫之旅。</p><p><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-e8a97b6bf25ed497ea293994deb50564_720w.jpeg?rss\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2264\" data-rawheight=\"1279\" data-watermark=\"original\" data-original-src=\"v2-e8a97b6bf25ed497ea293994deb50564\" data-watermark-src=\"v2-76be7a2d20171332fab8b41f28ee5f52\" data-private-watermark-src=\"v2-8195443f35bcc8c1c588c95eaa32178d\" style=\"max-width: 400px;\"></p><p data-pid=\"rGPJ-84r\">复仇，是这款游戏的主题，也是主角潜心磨练，踏上征途的理由。 </p><p data-pid=\"RTLY9Vdu\">主角在五个关卡的终点，需要面对的正是曾经的五个仇人——反目成仇，五个最熟悉的陌生人。 </p><p data-pid=\"jzbL7QeZ\">不仅是背叛者，而且还是弑父的凶手。在中国的古书《礼记》中有一句话是：“父之仇，弗与共戴天。” </p><p data-pid=\"5aJubEX7\">习武复仇，天经地义。 </p><p data-pid=\"LLEbOCF-\">主角需要孤身一人，依靠自己独特的功夫，穿越城市的隐蔽角落，猎杀所有敌人，并最终杀死每一个凶手，以告慰先父在天的亡灵。 </p><p data-pid=\"dNrotmOd\">这就是《师父》这款游戏的结局。</p><p><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-c2ef303ae8d0e4590d490685bb4d94db_720w.png?rss\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1920\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" data-watermark=\"original\" data-original-src=\"v2-c2ef303ae8d0e4590d490685bb4d94db\" data-watermark-src=\"v2-43d7cf2cd13e7d10a5cb0fb7aca5b689\" data-private-watermark-src=\"v2-0d3dc3b32c081dcfe35c24cde67f4e05\" style=\"max-width: 400px;\"></p><p data-pid=\"W2Idk6tE\">但是，中华文化又是如此博大精深、耐人寻味，中国的古语曾说：“以德报怨”、“冤冤相报何时了”；中华功夫不仅在于技艺的精湛，而且在于“武德”的追寻，老师父会教导自己的弟子说：“习武，是为了止戈。” </p><p data-pid=\"u1Zm4F2w\">就像游戏中的师父曾说的：“武艺高超，武德充沛之人，会令对手知难而退，不战而屈人之兵。” </p><p data-pid=\"JoER-vYS\"><b>复仇是一个永无止境的循环，真正的强者会让恨意止于己身。</b></p><p><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-384f91fd6f8ef8b0bd8639e05379b90b_720w.png?rss\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1920\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" data-watermark=\"original\" data-original-src=\"v2-384f91fd6f8ef8b0bd8639e05379b90b\" data-watermark-src=\"v2-2914d8b94be9f55e70263af1d44e2504\" data-private-watermark-src=\"v2-d6a305b0b1ebd132cf4fc083d9cbb61c\" style=\"max-width: 400px;\"></p><p data-pid=\"VLtYlo_j\">怀着对中华功夫更深层次的理解，我们为游戏设计了一个隐藏结局：如果你能找到一种方法来实现正义，并且始终忠于武德的价值观...你也许能够打破这个循环，玩家可以根据自己的理解在游戏中尝试并探索更多的可能——我们认为，领悟了其中的真谛，才能真正登上武学的山巅、进入更高的境界。 </p><p data-pid=\"GZ8hHeZd\"><b>当然，无论如何——选择的权利，一定在玩家手里。</b> </p>\n<br><br>\n来源：知乎 www.zhihu.com<br>\n    \n作者：<a ","descriptionType":"text/html","publishedDate":"Mon, 28 Feb 2022 08:25:11 +0000","feedId":77,"bgimg":"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-e8a97b6bf25ed497ea293994deb50564_720w.jpeg?rss","linkMd5":"876464499672f30d2c869030a9804980","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn41@2020_1/2022/03/14/08-27-00-610_a72d28c4e8cbc5d2.webp","destWidth":720,"destHeight":407,"sourceBytes":26816,"destBytes":14140,"author":"师父SIFU","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-e8a97b6bf25ed497ea293994deb50564_720w.jpeg?rss":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn41@2020_1/2022/03/14/08-27-00-610_a72d28c4e8cbc5d2.webp","https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-c2ef303ae8d0e4590d490685bb4d94db_720w.png?rss":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx19/cdn38@2020_6/2022/03/14/08-27-15-786_774a12bc128a153d.webp","https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-384f91fd6f8ef8b0bd8639e05379b90b_720w.png?rss":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn97@2020_2/2022/03/14/08-27-16-007_de8dd02ce7907e51.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1647246419508},{"createdTime":"2022-03-14 16:26:59","updatedTime":"2022-03-14 16:26:59","title":"身处南北方交界处，四季分明，买电车究竟是买三元锂电池还是磷酸铁锂电池？","link":"http://www.zhihu.com/question/520427647/answer/2382205686","description":"<p data-pid=\"HkfF5q5x\">题主base的苏南地区，冬天气温也就在0度上下，不会太冷。2021年元旦，在长江北岸的南京、扬州有过零下10度的严寒天气，但也只是短暂的一两天而已。</p><p data-pid=\"GfwyWjjE\">像Model 3、P7这种热门车型，采取了用<b>三元锂电池做长续航版本</b>、<b>磷酸铁锂电池做标准续航版本</b>的策略，应该买哪种呢？</p><p data-pid=\"H-vks1pj\">与三元锂相比，磷酸铁锂电池的特点：<b>成本低、寿命长、低温性能差</b>。<b>成本低，</b>意味着购车价格低；<b>寿命长，</b>意味着平时可以充到100%，而不担心衰减；<b>低温性能差，</b>意味着北方冬天要悠着点。</p><p data-pid=\"80x0Hsa0\"><b>在0度左右的温度区间，磷酸铁锂电池还属于「扛得住」的状态，问题不大</b>。要说续航有衰减吗，那当然也是有的，关键是三元锂电池的电动车，在这个温度下的衰减也不小啊！二者相比差别不大！</p><p data-pid=\"ugofTsft\">所以答案简单明了：<b>同等续航水平下，选磷酸铁锂</b>。</p><p data-pid=\"QZkwPEN3\">例如：如果都是500公里续航，那么磷酸铁锂版本的寿命更长（平时可以充到100%）、成本更低（车价低不低要看车企良心），显然选磷酸铁锂。</p><p data-pid=\"0uwipwcB\"><b>问题又来了，除了比亚迪汉全部使用磷酸铁锂之外，其它车企一般采用的是磷酸铁锂用于标准续航版本、三元锂用于长续航版本的策略，那咋选呢</b>？</p><p data-pid=\"VD6mqiu9\">建议采取如下原则：</p><ul><li data-pid=\"AWMrC7Zs\"><b>出行需求优先原则</b>：如果只是为了上下班代步，出行需求少，那就算是在北京这么冷的地方，也没必要选三元锂，买个磷酸铁锂的标准续航版本就可以了；如果经常开长途，出行需求长，那就算在广东这么暖和的地方，也最好选三元锂的超长续航版本。</li></ul><blockquote data-pid=\"9-pqUUZr\">举例： 标续版本NEDC续航在500公里以下，冬天长途按300不到估算，意味着可以上海-无锡往返，上海-常州直达，但不能上海-南京直达。<br>长续版本按670公里、冬天长途按400估算，可以上海-常州往返，可以上海-南京直达。</blockquote><ul><li data-pid=\"j-xYL8H6\"><b>无家充桩考虑长续</b>：如果没有家充桩的话，意味着充电不那么便利。如果长续航版本一周一充，那么标续版本可能就要一周两充，便利性天差地别。这种情况下，就可能要考虑多花2-4万元来减少充电麻烦了！</li></ul>\n<br><br>\n来源：知乎 www.zhihu.com<br>\n    \n作者：<a href=\"http://www.zhihu.com/people/zhangkangkang?utm_campaign=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_source=rss&utm_content=author\">张抗抗</a><br>\n            \n<br>\n【知乎日报】千万用户的选择，做朋友圈里的新鲜事分享大牛。\n        <a href=\"http://daily.zhihu.com?utm_source=rssyanwenzi&utm_campaign=tuijian&utm_medium=rssnormal\" target=\"_blank\">点击下载</a><br>\n<br>\n此问题还有 <a href=\"http://www.zhihu.com/question/520427647/answer/2382205686?utm_campaign=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_source=rss&utm_content=title\" target=\"_blank\">8 个回答，查看全部。</a><br>\n                延伸阅读：<br>\n<a href=\"http://www.zhihu.com/question/478132477?utm_campaign=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_source=rss&utm_content=title\" target=\"_blank\">电动汽车充满到同样续航里程，磷酸铁锂电池和三元锂电池哪个跑的实际里程更长？</a><br>\n            \n<a href=\"http://www.zhihu.com/question/434952446?utm_campaign=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_source=rss&utm_content=title\" target=\"_blank\">为什么磷酸铁锂电池比三元锂电池在低温下性能表现更差？有什么办法可以解决这一问题吗？</a><br>\n            ","descriptionType":"text/html","publishedDate":"Thu, 10 Mar 2022 10:01:54 +0000","feedId":77,"bgimg":"","linkMd5":"d50ba1619b4347099fbd2e417cc4bec3","bgimgJsdelivr":"","metaImg":"","author":"张抗抗","publishedOrCreatedDate":1647246419455},{"createdTime":"2022-03-14 16:26:59","updatedTime":"2022-03-14 16:26:59","title":"如何评价《画江湖之不良人》第 5 季第 9  集？","link":"http://www.zhihu.com/question/519830352/answer/2382566123","description":"<p data-pid=\"cx2BDAjq\">大好我鱼今九。<br><br>首先让我们热烈欢迎漂泊的水手温韬和上官云巧儿归来，久违的“星云~~~”也回来了，之前大家应该很疑惑8集开头是谁在帮老李调查传信，正是这俩活宝，二人的回归也让老李轻松了不少，笑容也多了。</p><p><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d967f85eec4ee113fdbecea6fc6021b6_720w.jpg?rss\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"5118\" data-rawheight=\"2124\" data-watermark=\"watermark\" data-original-src=\"v2-d967f85eec4ee113fdbecea6fc6021b6\" data-watermark-src=\"v2-e2ac347b0206a65b8b70fc35639468e5\" data-private-watermark-src=\"v2-e9bdc10f6d527cae11e67fdbf06ef89b\" style=\"max-width: 400px;\"></p><p data-pid=\"GKQQk03z\">我也不打哑谜了，老李看上了大帅的位子，上一回在三千院的“配合”下，老李兵不血刃给予了不良人们震慑，一记驱虎吞狼覆灭了总舵但也变相保住了不良人的大部队(感谢拆迁队大队长李存礼)。</p><p><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-ffc2502d85b19dd1587b05993b5a6cf8_720w.jpg?rss\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"5108\" data-rawheight=\"2106\" data-watermark=\"watermark\" data-original-src=\"v2-ffc2502d85b19dd1587b05993b5a6cf8\" data-watermark-src=\"v2-f13fe48194c38dd785a2262527cfa508\" data-private-watermark-src=\"v2-970a17aea9111a63ff7f467312f82c39\" style=\"max-width: 400px;\"></p><p><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-2f8f5694c456bcc47337074ae906711a_720w.jpg?rss\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"5098\" data-rawheight=\"2118\" data-watermark=\"watermark\" data-original-src=\"v2-2f8f5694c456bcc47337074ae906711a\" data-watermark-src=\"v2-3e044f8fc0e6748b0441ce8c5f62685a\" data-private-watermark-src=\"v2-48f0b026dbfac8598d5aa5d2529ead3f\" style=\"max-width: 400px;\"></p><p data-pid=\"iQhaSgrB\">但只凭震慑还是不足以扭转不良人们长期以来的固有思想，虽说老李现在武力超群，但他不会选择以武力去降服不良人，他需要的不仅仅是得到不良人的身体还要得到不良人的心！他不是袁天罡也成为不了袁天罡，他只能趟出一条属于自己的路。同理三千院也心中清楚，所以他没有进一步推进，而是再次伪装去获取信息同时遣骆小北再次回归，继续跟进老李他们的动向，他需要老李做的更多。（大家觉得Intro里的镜心魔是镜心魔呢还是三千院呢？）<br><br>在我们的设定中，天藏星三千院没有绝顶的武功却能坐镇总舵暂代不良帅之职，是因为他的能力可以让他在任何时候保全自己，只要他不想，就没人知道他是谁他在哪儿。然而他在老李面前却自曝好几次了，他心里清楚老李不会拿他怎么样，而且三千院的“配合”是单方面的，老李目前并不知情，上一回也没有刻意的去往那个方向拍，当然聪明的观众一眼就看懂了。这里再借机说一下不良人三十六星宿的命名问题，我们最早的确是借鉴的水浒三十六天罡，但这些不良人可有太多能说道的了。他们不同于通文馆的十三太保和幻音坊九天圣姬，我们希望能在未来对于他们的刻画更自由更有意思（毕竟我们是原创嘛）。举个例子，如果本人也是不良人！那他可以叫天搞星，或者我们跟现实或者某个IP进行联动，比如“贝贝漫”，不是江湖人称天贝星嘛~（第一次看她的解析，我直接去找的老杨，问他这是不是自己人……别人是分析她是在刨坟doge）所以三千院一开始是叫天藏（cang）星，只是后来我觉得他特能藏就叫藏实在是土，天藏（zang）星念起来更霸气，同时兼顾cang的意思。<br><br>再说回本集，这一集有些平淡，因为要汇集之前的各种信息同时为接下来的展开做铺垫，当然这也是最后的平淡了。不知道大家还记不记得第7集最后，李存礼告知李嗣源他要找的人找到了，而李嗣源却露出有些忧伤的神情，深沉的说“三日后，启程太原”。因为他找不到温韬就找不到他想要的东西，只能启动第二个方案——毁掉太原。李嗣源生于太原，而如今，他却要亲手将其毁掉。他李嗣源再冷血再狠毒也是人，人，孰能无情。只是苦了我们的上饶公主，前有百分百空手接白刃，现有百分百被李嗣源绑。</p><p><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-8199685faa8baf9336aaa131b1d885f4_720w.jpg?rss\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"5114\" data-rawheight=\"2118\" data-watermark=\"watermark\" data-original-src=\"v2-8199685faa8baf9336aaa131b1d885f4\" data-watermark-src=\"v2-aab4a3e87a9e312c445bb19ce9d38e0d\" data-private-watermark-src=\"v2-fb30979b23a6e5a239b3403ec3e1a0e8\" data-tags=\"porn\" style=\"max-width: 400px;\"></p><p data-pid=\"kYjBC2d3\">李嗣源已称监国，日思夜想的帝位近在咫尺，他要毁太原绝不能为他人道，因为他是一个好监国也将会是一个好皇帝！我们是演义，不能脱离史实。于是他绑架了上饶威胁焊魃给他日以继夜的制作火药，再嫁祸给“欲弑天子大逆不道”的不良人。</p><p><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d0833da87e52710d029b78dc6415617d_720w.jpg?rss\" data-caption=\"我老喜欢他这个表情了，之前忘记放了\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2048\" data-rawheight=\"852\" data-watermark=\"watermark\" data-original-src=\"v2-d0833da87e52710d029b78dc6415617d\" data-watermark-src=\"v2-16d52ec12ddea2489a0ad49a768bfa75\" data-private-watermark-src=\"v2-398bcaf57d95b2d0763649d004bc6730\" style=\"max-width: 400px;\"></p><p data-pid=\"xlGP6qTm\">而痴情的焊魃和审美堪比阿姐的上饶在一起，很般配，放心他俩不刀。<br><br>最后再说说我近期了解到的一些情况，有关心我们的粉丝觉得我们公司快要倒闭了。首先感谢大家的关心，目前的情况是我们公司的管理层正在积极与各方协商寻求解决方案，据我所知没那么悲观。我能保证的是第六季也许会迟到但绝对不会缺席！还有粉丝以为我们换了主创团队并且不良人废导演，虽然制作团队换了一波血，但主创团队一直都没换过，不但没换还在一直补充新鲜的血液，我们需要更新的思维和更多样的风格，老带新一直是若森的传统。如今通过第五季我们制作团队也有了起色，我相信未来会更好！再次感谢粉丝儿们的关心~笔芯~<br><br>当然废导演是真的。</p>\n<br><br>\n来源：知乎 ","descriptionType":"text/html","publishedDate":"Thu, 10 Mar 2022 05:33:15 data-pid=\"RVVEP4do\">陈师姐的设定还是会和大家心里想的一样，不会做成什么替韩某挡刀领便当的迷惑行为，白菊山也很好看。在场景美学上，我们有自信不输阵仗。</p><p 延伸阅读：<br>\n<a href=\"http://www.zhihu.com/question/521637986?utm_campaign=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_source=rss&utm_content=title\" target=\"_blank\">如何评价国产动画《凡人修仙传》年番第二十集？</a><br>\n            \n<a href=\"http://www.zhihu.com/question/392067425?utm_campaign=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_source=rss&utm_content=title\" target=\"_blank\">如何评价电影《斗罗大陆》?</a><br>\n            ","descriptionType":"text/html","publishedDate":"Mon, 07 Mar 2022 03:14:02 +0000","feedId":77,"bgimg":"","linkMd5":"b79c7897e58335d8fe7892c726f21f7f","bgimgJsdelivr":"","metaImg":"","author":"王裕仁","publishedOrCreatedDate":1647246419479},{"createdTime":"2022-03-14 16:26:59","updatedTime":"2022-03-14 16:26:59","title":"如何评价国产动画《少年歌行 风花雪月篇》23 集（下部第 7 集）？","link":"http://www.zhihu.com/question/519578224/answer/2370511503","description":"<p data-pid=\"U1XdFovk\">大家好，我是《<a href=\"https://www.zhihu.com/search?q=%E5%B0%91%E5%B9%B4%E6%AD%8C%E8%A1%8C&amp;search_source=Entity&amp;hybrid_search_source=Entity&amp;hybrid_search_extra=%7B\" class=\"internal\">少年歌行</a>》、《少年歌行 风花雪月篇》的制作总监付堃。</p><p data-pid=\"kHghDDJa\"> 《少年歌行 风花雪月篇》下部目前更新到了第23集。面对暗河的追杀，千落放出了雪月城的求信号，希望能有盟友前来助阵。</p><p><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-988adabd9d97d64fc41d2a46163a8fba_720w.jpeg?rss\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1920\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" data-watermark=\"watermark\" data-original-src=\"v2-988adabd9d97d64fc41d2a46163a8fba\" data-watermark-src=\"v2-2c0e4df74823e47c52a1976f5815f234\" data-private-watermark-src=\"v2-617200db3d015bd4125493c7977ed57b\" style=\"max-width: 400px;\"></p><p><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-5bc8292bfe8a890add070ab819a6b292_720w.jpeg?rss\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1920\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" data-watermark=\"watermark\" data-original-src=\"v2-5bc8292bfe8a890add070ab819a6b292\" data-watermark-src=\"v2-9ddf9dd4793b76a6bd044541c18e5a07\" data-private-watermark-src=\"v2-75ca0e1c5c0824ee4ff8e62fd10fa36f\" style=\"max-width: 400px;\"></p><p data-pid=\"9Z5HlDy-\"> 但这样做也暴露了自己的行踪，暗河闻讯继续追杀，但幸运的是他们被明轩所救，来到了剑心冢。雷无桀也于外公相认，并得知自己母亲的故事。另一边，萧瑟在昏迷之际也想到了琅琊王一案，也想明白了一些事......</p><p><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-247ba4ae769733086b91c2314bfe664c_720w.jpeg?rss\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1920\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" data-watermark=\"watermark\" data-original-src=\"v2-247ba4ae769733086b91c2314bfe664c\" data-watermark-src=\"v2-9d2417f601ede5cda6982c8685544eb2\" data-private-watermark-src=\"v2-50a44e9ea2ce2a727d7b742984778f1b\" style=\"max-width: 400px;\"></p><p><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-b8294afd6c2b3c55c36fdfbc638c94f9_720w.jpeg?rss\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1920\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" data-watermark=\"watermark\" data-original-src=\"v2-b8294afd6c2b3c55c36fdfbc638c94f9\" data-watermark-src=\"v2-89d50ec86a61880a6092b278aef4586f\" data-private-watermark-src=\"v2-0680c59915ea6543ac741af300a650a0\" style=\"max-width: 400px;\"></p><p data-pid=\"kZUeO54b\"> 从本集来看，依旧是多条故事线并行，思路清晰，节奏安排恰到好处。在整个故事里依旧起到承上启下的作用，最后的结尾处也为后续剧情埋下了伏笔。</p><p><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-c142ae7eafe6d37a4c9c9412d3aecdd0_720w.jpeg?rss\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1920\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" data-watermark=\"watermark\" data-original-src=\"v2-c142ae7eafe6d37a4c9c9412d3aecdd0\" data-watermark-src=\"v2-1fbc7e2977c4e3c9643cb6117a73e4bb\" data-private-watermark-src=\"v2-084cd8af4334c7f9ccdd9784cc31ad0b\" style=\"max-width: 400px;\"></p><p data-pid=\"o9uIBP6Y\"> 这里我个人比较喜欢的是雷无桀与李素王的对手戏部分。其中，李素王坐在桌前挠桌子那一段的表演设计的很好。在讲述自己女儿故事的同时，作为一个父亲的那种对女儿的心疼和被雷梦杀带走自己女儿以后那种不满和气愤的情绪表现的淋漓尽致。</p><p><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-74639f2c3652e0f3bc9fb6ccde6c381c_720w.jpeg?rss\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1920\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" data-watermark=\"watermark\" data-original-src=\"v2-74639f2c3652e0f3bc9fb6ccde6c381c\" data-watermark-src=\"v2-193ea0bc6dadc23ef809bae77d292cc4\" data-private-watermark-src=\"v2-d904ac316bd49370a442aec1f9466536\" style=\"max-width: 400px;\"></p><p><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-6ff23aabbe665137bf22934879af0a52_720w.jpeg?rss\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1920\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" data-watermark=\"watermark\" data-original-src=\"v2-6ff23aabbe665137bf22934879af0a52\" data-watermark-src=\"v2-2cdf53a4d282918c444d30cc6fa274da\" data-private-watermark-src=\"v2-5ece49ab2a110314819a99fdade0dd4d\" style=\"max-width: 400px;\"></p><p><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-9ddb7073ad9a3b3be20c111029946daa_720w.jpeg?rss\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1920\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" data-watermark=\"watermark\" data-original-src=\"v2-9ddb7073ad9a3b3be20c111029946daa\" data-watermark-src=\"v2-2ba332ee5897cacbdc2388dc9329cc9d\" data-private-watermark-src=\"v2-ad8209e2098a79f4d66bd8c3b071063f\" style=\"max-width: 400px;\"></p><p><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b24e7ace7951614e51feb89ddb8a029f_720w.jpeg?rss\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1920\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" data-watermark=\"watermark\" data-original-src=\"v2-b24e7ace7951614e51feb89ddb8a029f\" data-watermark-src=\"v2-70045efe415c0439aff3ac04c76a20e8\" data-private-watermark-src=\"v2-a7835de14db005181646b2dae43caf3c\" style=\"max-width: 400px;\"></p><p data-pid=\"3FCEdpNe\">最后躺在底下打滚设计也十分有趣。联系前面我们能看到，对于外人来说他是威严庄重的剑心冢掌门，而当他与外孙讲述女儿的时候，像是小孩子一样。眼睁睁的看着他的至亲离开他，将自己的委屈与难过用打滚的方式表达出来。这种情绪上的前后反差做的非常好，将人物性格塑造的十分立体，这也让表演更加趣味性。</p><p><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-79027dfd2cd54b8ac61b8122bdc43a7d_720w.jpeg?rss\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1920\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" data-watermark=\"watermark\" data-original-src=\"v2-79027dfd2cd54b8ac61b8122bdc43a7d\" data-watermark-src=\"v2-18851a28a9ec4aebacdbc9760ec3686a\" data-private-watermark-src=\"v2-3eb7235b6cec8c2cc07825aa576826b9\" style=\"max-width: 400px;\"></p><p data-pid=\"jFR7jbor\"> 此外，让我深有感触的就是李素王与雷无桀说的对话：“剑冢的传人其实就是心剑的剑师，不一定非得会铸剑，你要闯江湖就去闯你的江湖吧。”从这里我们能看到很多父母都希望孩子能按照他们设计好的人生规划成长。</p><p><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-6ff23aabbe665137bf22934879af0a52_720w.jpeg?rss\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1920\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" data-watermark=\"watermark\" data-original-src=\"v2-6ff23aabbe665137bf22934879af0a52\" data-watermark-src=\"v2-2cdf53a4d282918c444d30cc6fa274da\" data-private-watermark-src=\"v2-5ece49ab2a110314819a99fdade0dd4d\" style=\"max-width: 400px;\"></p><p data-pid=\"-Ob6eOhU\"> 但是，年轻人应该有自己的人生目标和计划，而不是一味地听从父母的安排。或许父母这样做的出发点没有错，但要分清是不是这样自己想要的。“少年人应该有自己的江湖”，没错，未来是属于你自己的。靠自己打拼出来的天下才算是真的成长，而这样人生的才会有意义。</p><p data-pid=\"0io_nVs3\">那么雷无桀收下“心剑”会留在剑心冢吗？萧瑟究竟想明白了什么？更多精彩，记得每周三上午10点来优酷&amp;bilibili捧场哦~</p>\n<br><br>\n来源：知乎 www.zhihu.com<br>\n    \n作者：<a ","descriptionType":"text/html","publishedDate":"Thu, 03 Mar 2022 04:14:04 +0000","feedId":77,"bgimg":"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-988adabd9d97d64fc41d2a46163a8fba_720w.jpeg?rss","linkMd5":"141831768ad2058eae76387e7d533662","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn34@2020_2/2022/03/14/08-27-00-487_bc4ab183c43a725c.webp","destWidth":720,"destHeight":405,"sourceBytes":64294,"destBytes":31776,"author":"付昆","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-988adabd9d97d64fc41d2a46163a8fba_720w.jpeg?rss":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn34@2020_2/2022/03/14/08-27-00-487_bc4ab183c43a725c.webp","https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-5bc8292bfe8a890add070ab819a6b292_720w.jpeg?rss":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn93@2020_1/2022/03/14/08-27-06-942_e59cd0ad84713f3e.webp","https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-247ba4ae769733086b91c2314bfe664c_720w.jpeg?rss":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn71@2020_5/2022/03/14/08-27-05-070_66f1d756f325d176.webp","https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-b8294afd6c2b3c55c36fdfbc638c94f9_720w.jpeg?rss":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn93@2020_5/2022/03/14/08-27-12-050_bc9ccd5ba8224d08.webp","https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-c142ae7eafe6d37a4c9c9412d3aecdd0_720w.jpeg?rss":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn64@2020_2/2022/03/14/08-27-09-001_1e33d8293686b0b0.webp","https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-74639f2c3652e0f3bc9fb6ccde6c381c_720w.jpeg?rss":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn70@2020_4/2022/03/14/08-27-17-322_44b1d07f074d9708.webp","https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-6ff23aabbe665137bf22934879af0a52_720w.jpeg?rss":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn24@2020_3/2022/03/14/08-27-05-985_4c121a90f3972f6c.webp","https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-9ddb7073ad9a3b3be20c111029946daa_720w.jpeg?rss":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn92@2020_6/2022/03/14/08-27-04-103_10a9d871ebf0302b.webp","https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b24e7ace7951614e51feb89ddb8a029f_720w.jpeg?rss":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx22/cdn94@2020_6/2022/03/14/08-27-17-473_f5a5344f6bd47486.webp","https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-79027dfd2cd54b8ac61b8122bdc43a7d_720w.jpeg?rss":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn37@2020_3/2022/03/14/08-27-08-193_a6aff35b95c30cfd.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1647246419496},{"createdTime":"2022-03-14 16:26:59","updatedTime":"2022-03-14 16:26:59","title":"超充快充会影响电池寿命吗？有没有什么别的风险？","link":"http://www.zhihu.com/question/520431913/answer/2388493243","description":"<p data-pid=\"6ga0MskV\">会影响，但是使用正确的情况下对寿命的影响很小。</p><p data-pid=\"dMcCatlA\">如果从电池容量衰减的原理来看，电池老化的原因要么是因为副反应而导致的锂离子流失，要么是因为正极或者负极的结构损伤而导致的可储存锂离子数目变少。</p><p><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-613faac8895e41ec66f477ca67690915_720w.png?rss\" data-caption=\"（左：正常的充放电，中：副反应导致的锂离子损失，右：正负极损伤导致的可储存锂离子数下降）\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"675\" data-rawheight=\"121\" data-watermark=\"original\" data-original-src=\"v2-613faac8895e41ec66f477ca67690915\" data-watermark-src=\"v2-975c0105136e5a6d900f002ed440c3d5\" data-private-watermark-src=\"v2-59fd054b55ddabdea9581f7e8d0e02db\" style=\"max-width: 400px;\"></p><p data-pid=\"TErrz3FX\">导致锂离子损失的副反应大多集中在正负极表面，比如对于负极，在液态锂离子电池首次充放电过程中，电极材料就会与<a href=\"https://www.zhihu.com/search?q=%E7%94%B5%E8%A7%A3%E6%B6%B2&amp;search_source=Entity&amp;hybrid_search_source=Entity&amp;hybrid_search_extra=%7B:,:1786924202%7D\" class=\"internal\">电解液</a>在固液相界面上发生反应形成覆盖于电极材料表面的钝化层，这层钝化膜被称为“固体电解质界面膜”( solid electrolyte interface) ，简称SEI膜。各种非理想化的充放电过程都可能导致SEI膜的不稳定，而无论是SEI膜的损坏再生成，又或者是SEI膜的野蛮生长，都会不断导致锂离子损失。</p><p data-pid=\"MrSNUAyW\">同样正极也有各种副反应。比如Mn和Co等金属在副反应中可能从正极融入电解质，导致一方面锂离子的存储元素流失而造成可存储的锂减少，另外一方面这些<a href=\"https://www.zhihu.com/search?q=%E9%87%91%E5%B1%9E%E5%85%83%E7%B4%A0&amp;search_source=Entity&amp;hybrid_search_source=Entity&amp;hybrid_search_extra=%7B:,:1786924202%7D\" class=\"internal\">金属元素</a>又可能参与负极SEI膜的<a href=\"https://www.zhihu.com/search?q=%E5%8C%96%E5%AD%A6%E5%8F%8D%E5%BA%94&amp;search_source=Entity&amp;hybrid_search_source=Entity&amp;hybrid_search_extra=%7B:,:1786924202%7D\" class=\"internal\">化学反应</a>而毒害负极。除了这些副反应，电池的正负极还可能因为物理上的热胀冷缩或者过热等原因而造成结构损伤。</p><p data-pid=\"YUY4EcJB\">如果对上面这些主要导致电池老化和容量衰减的原因以及可能会导致这些副反应/破坏效应加剧的原因进行统计就会得到下面这几张表格。</p><p><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-667b002641cb6c1a80068c4fd84a74c0_720w.png?rss\" data-caption=\"各类导致锂电池老化的原因汇总\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1055\" data-rawheight=\"426\" data-watermark=\"original\" data-original-src=\"v2-667b002641cb6c1a80068c4fd84a74c0\" data-watermark-src=\"v2-e4a4fc9ab4783c696dd6da79fbf824f0\" data-private-watermark-src=\"v2-fcfa8db2007a7259c1a3d4706071a23d\" style=\"max-width: 400px;\"></p><p data-pid=\"Q0Am4x5k\">在这么多电池老化的影响因素中，日常大家担心的超充导致的负面项我专门用红色框出：超充可能加速的副反应或者正负极/电解液结构损伤只有四项，而电池寿命的真正天敌，也是基本每项都出现的则是过充/过放，以及高温。</p><p data-pid=\"3EWKZrag\">避免高温，这个事情交给BMS（电池控制器）来控制冷却系统即可，也不是我们消费者需要担心的。我们所能做的就是避免电池的过充/过放，也就是不要等到最后一公里再去充电，而充电的时候也不要完全充满。</p><p data-pid=\"Zc-yx_KI\">我没有见过车企不建议用户使用超充，但是基本每家都会建议用户不要把电池“放得过空”或者“充得过满“。同样我也没见过有手机厂商建议用户不要用超充而只用5V充电，反而最新的系统都会建议用户不要充得过满以延长电池寿命。下图左侧是我的小鹏P7建议的不要充过90%，右图是我的iPhone建议的不要充电至80%以上，其实说的都是一个事情。</p><p><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-9382c03c844ed2fe7dfa62d9a93518ca_720w.png?rss\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1045\" data-rawheight=\"326\" data-watermark=\"original\" data-original-src=\"v2-9382c03c844ed2fe7dfa62d9a93518ca\" data-watermark-src=\"v2-e02c0aeaed82b9f9c178c35d4f7512af\" data-private-watermark-src=\"v2-e96fb662e7ea8742dc39243071a587bd\" style=\"max-width: 400px;\"></p><p data-pid=\"h4R0QWwI\">所以放心大胆去享受超充吧。有个<a href=\"https://www.zhihu.com/search?q=%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BDModel&amp;search_source=Entity&amp;hybrid_search_source=Entity&amp;hybrid_search_extra=%7B:,:1786924202%7D\" class=\"internal\">美国Model</a>3车主基本只用超充跑了10万英里（16万公里）但是电量只衰减了2.5%，而他所作的只是浅放浅充，仅有两次将Model 3的电量跑至10%以下，并且使用超充时也从来不会充电超过60%。</p>\n<br><br>\n来源：知乎 www.zhihu.com<br>\n    \n作者：<a href=\"http://www.zhihu.com/people/one-kebab?utm_campaign=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_source=rss&utm_content=author\">一个kebab</a><br>\n            \n<br>\n【知乎日报】千万用户的选择，做朋友圈里的新鲜事分享大牛。\n        <a href=\"http://daily.zhihu.com?utm_source=rssyanwenzi&utm_campaign=tuijian&utm_medium=rssnormal\" target=\"_blank\">点击下载</a><br>延伸阅读：<br>\n<a href=\"http://www.zhihu.com/question/502828839?utm_campaign=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_source=rss&utm_content=title\" target=\"_blank\">为什么很多电动汽车都在宣传自己的快充时说多久充电80%，为什么不直接说多久充满？</a><br>\n            \n<a href=\"http://www.zhihu.com/question/462347805?utm_campaign=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_source=rss&utm_content=title\" target=\"_blank\">大众新推出的ID4 系列电池使用感怎么样？好像是快充能达到10分钟充满行驶100km的电量？</a><br>\n            ","descriptionType":"text/html","publishedDate":"Mon, 14 Mar 2022 05:51:16 +0000","feedId":77,"bgimg":"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-613faac8895e41ec66f477ca67690915_720w.png?rss","linkMd5":"57f8236663497a6a126372cacae34aaf","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx3/cdn98@2020_5/2022/03/14/08-27-00-464_3329cc572f76dcda.webp","destWidth":675,"destHeight":121,"sourceBytes":45304,"destBytes":14100,"author":"一个kebab","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-613faac8895e41ec66f477ca67690915_720w.png?rss":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx3/cdn98@2020_5/2022/03/14/08-27-00-464_3329cc572f76dcda.webp","https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-667b002641cb6c1a80068c4fd84a74c0_720w.png?rss":null,"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-9382c03c844ed2fe7dfa62d9a93518ca_720w.png?rss":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn58@2020_1/2022/03/14/08-27-17-273_9596bb5809826821.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1647246419419},{"createdTime":"2022-03-14 16:26:59","updatedTime":"2022-03-14 16:26:59","title":"中国有《摇曳露营》那样的的露营地点吗？","link":"http://www.zhihu.com/question/322879658/answer/2325189909","description":"<p data-pid=\"OzBk4Yuz\">有很多，而且越来越多。</p>\n<p data-pid=\"OcVBlzjg\">我去过全国各地的很多营地，也特别喜欢《摇曳露营△》，它让我找到了最初露营时的那种感觉，让我记起了那时的单纯与快乐。</p>\n<p data-pid=\"Ezve1I_c\">我想借着这个问题，好好盘点一下《摇曳露营△》里出现的所有营地，并找出在中国与之类似的营地，一起重温那份美好与快乐。</p>\n<h2>《摇曳露营△》中出现过的营地汇总</h2>\n<p data-pid=\"kvqMRGhL\">在《摇曳露营△》第1、2季中，出现的营地有14个，整理如下：</p>\n<table src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d68c3997d72ce942e5ba07ff38632ebd_720w.jpg?rss\" data-caption=\"营地地图\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"4297\" data-rawheight=\"2001\" data-watermark=\"watermark\" data-original-src=\"v2-d68c3997d72ce942e5ba07ff38632ebd\" data-watermark-src=\"v2-fa34ace74d215e8027da864139395ff3\" data-private-watermark-src=\"v2-acb61c89e005a023da1ee39dd1f99c92\" style=\"max-width: 400px;\" /></p>\n<p data-pid=\"GkGLL0-T\">----------&lt; 分割线：第二个通宵，每个营地都有Web端也太好了，泪目( Ĭ ^ Ĭ ) &gt;---------</p>\n<h2>国内比较成熟的类似营地</h2>\n<p data-pid=\"BBkzgFhb\">我自己做露营，今年已经是第9年了，亲眼见证中国从只有数十家营地，到现在有数千家营地，虽然市场还没有成熟，品质高的营地仍然稀缺，但毕竟走上了快速发展的道路。</p>\n<p data-pid=\"b6wRUoMr\">我很乐意推荐我所熟知的好营地，帮助他们更好地发展，让更多人享受到露营的快乐，所以，根据出现在《摇曳露营△》中各个营地的特点，我在自己所了解的营地中也挑选了14个比较相似的优质营地：</p>\n<ol>\n <li data-pid=\"RL763ULG\">天开野餐公园（北京）</li>\n <li data-pid=\"QJVN_3Ax\">ABC Camping Village（浙江杭州）</li>\n <li data-pid=\"YUqUa62L\">安吉松林湖营地（浙江湖州）</li>\n <li data-pid=\"TtBWHCWX\">小野公园WildPark（浙江湖州）</li>\n <li data-pid=\"suY8hnoy\">薄刀嘴岛·路萤营地（浙江舟山）</li>\n <li data-pid=\"dBTdEuYI\">草原星宿营地（广东韶关）</li>\n <li data-pid=\"k-A2OPNO\">MANNSAN漫山野-森林河谷营地（广东惠州）</li>\n <li data-pid=\"JivBTIBh\">姚家山香溪谷营地（湖北武汉）</li>\n <li data-pid=\"BXC12CO3\">枫香云堡营地（湖北武汉）</li>\n <li data-pid=\"iQ6qynbn\">九宫山营地（湖北咸宁）</li>\n <li data-pid=\"PxT5MYHA\">拾云营地（四川阿坝藏族羌族自治州）</li>\n <li data-pid=\"Yje2sIRx\">三岔湖桃花岛营地（四川成都）</li>\n <li data-pid=\"oKxYGiyj\">海螺沟若丁山七号营地（四川甘孜藏族自治州）</li>\n <li data-pid=\"8qOBr9g1\">鲸梦谷营地（陕西西安）</li>\n</ol>\n<h3>1、天开野餐公园（北京）</h3>\n<p data-pid=\"UDlULRVU\">地址：北京市房山区韩村河镇天开村天开水库<br>预定：微信公众号-天开自然<br>价格：自备帐篷露营票180元，12岁以上18岁以下儿童露营票100元</br></br></p>\n<p><img data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"668\" data-rawheight=\"869\" data-watermark=\"watermark\" data-original-src=\"v2-ff0203c85eb45c941625cb3fbbf410bc\" Village（浙江杭州）</h3>\n<p data-pid=\"a2Mgf9bb\">地址：浙江省杭州市淳安县梓桐生态养殖场<br>网站：<a href=\"http://link.zhihu.com/?target=http%3A//www.abccamping.cn/\" class=\" wrap external\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noreferrer\">ABC Camping Village</a><br>预定：微信公众号-ABC Camping<br>价格：自备帐篷120元/人/晚，12岁以下儿童免票</br></br></br></p>\n<p><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-7f7be1491f7bb78a0e0fd3aa84b1e8a7_720w.jpg?rss\" data-pid=\"h93pd3Dt\">地址：四川省甘孜藏族自治州泸定县磨西镇甘孜海螺沟七号营地客栈<br>预定：客服电话&amp;微信-13618134781<br>价格：自备帐篷100元/人</br></br></p>\n<p><img style=\"max-width: 400px;\" /></p>\n<h3>14、鲸梦谷营地（陕西西安）</h3>\n<p data-pid=\"xKxtWjKD\">地址：西安市蓝田县鲸梦谷<br>预定：微信公众号-鲸梦谷营地<br>价格：自备帐篷188元/人，5~11岁半价，不满5岁免票</br></br></p>\n<p><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-7913498fb68b37680b73d4dd9cb56d9f_720w.jpg?rss\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1500\" data-rawheight=\"843\" data-watermark=\"watermark\" data-rawheight=\"595\" data-watermark=\"watermark\" data-original-src=\"v2-ec0083a5239c5bc7c54325c568213ba9\" data-watermark-src=\"v2-87f094302fda7c5b7d25949c9ae55811\" data-private-watermark-src=\"v2-86bdfc65a3d8d1aa4b5a390f50a8e435\" style=\"max-width: 400px;\" /></p>\n<p><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-24e90af80e7dc4c6a7cb2394213698e1_720w.jpg?rss\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1500\" data-rawheight=\"1000\" data-watermark=\"watermark\" data-original-src=\"v2-24e90af80e7dc4c6a7cb2394213698e1\" data-watermark-src=\"v2-1723500e82b8ec0f2545cae17c4c7a27\" data-private-watermark-src=\"v2-b87753cd42ee231caec842102c1b74c6\" style=\"max-width: 400px;\" /></p>\n<p><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-272ff9aa57d5b3ab829e1fb357ab1616_720w.jpg?rss\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1500\" data-rawheight=\"2000\" data-watermark=\"watermark\" data-original-src=\"v2-272ff9aa57d5b3ab829e1fb357ab1616\" data-watermark-src=\"v2-cf7da23ae72139de58658bef5816a0f7\" data-private-watermark-src=\"v2-288f201573204f3d03434ebd6bd7962d\" style=\"max-width: 400px;\" /></p>\n<p><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-2f92d6df68443f7d7078b3b4502dc675_720w.jpg?rss\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1799\" data-rawheight=\"1799\" data-watermark=\"watermark\" data-original-src=\"v2-2f92d6df68443f7d7078b3b4502dc675\" data-watermark-src=\"v2-7564990ae8f0b70a72ab55fb437f4c9a\" data-private-watermark-src=\"v2-5ab39e608131467d4fd4c573c4cd26e3\" style=\"max-width: 400px;\" /></p>\n<p><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-bebeab8b0ed759b638514bf67e249522_720w.jpg?rss\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1979\" data-rawheight=\"1312\" data-watermark=\"watermark\" data-original-src=\"v2-bebeab8b0ed759b638514bf67e249522\" data-watermark-src=\"v2-f3ed075c20763f5048675065929aa12a\" data-private-watermark-src=\"v2-113343ee4e020c6042f1bd7dca7ae6bb\" style=\"max-width: 400px;\" /></p>\n<p data-pid=\"xSC4v8xK\">以上就是我觉得与《摇曳露营△》比较相似，且比较优质的露营地，如果你有自己特别喜欢的营地，也可以告诉我，我会持续更新。</p>\n<p data-pid=\"wnve7TVf\">----------&lt; 分割线：第三个通宵，累死了，睡觉去了，╭(๑´^`๑)╮​&gt;---------</p>\n<h2>我与摇曳露营的故事</h2>\n<p data-pid=\"gAKX16bY\">对于我而言，露营，是一种生命的状态，一种打开自己，去感受这个世界的状态，从大自然中汲取生命的力量。</p>\n<p data-pid=\"DcxikUor\">其实，在看摇曳露营之前，因为工作上的原因，我对于露营的热情，渐渐磨灭，都已经准备放弃，因为露营的美好，在我的心中，已经所剩无几。</p>\n<p data-pid=\"pChGubw-\">试问，一个对露营已经失去热情的人，怎么做得好露营这件事呢？</p>\n<p data-pid=\"Nn34C1KR\">一天晚上，我打开《摇曳露营△》，看着看着，不由得泪流满面。这不就是露营的美好么？这不就是我的热情么？这不就是我曾经想象中的露营场景么？</p>\n<p data-pid=\"kP03tX3k\">梦想的余烬，仿佛添加了些许柴薪，无论怎样的境遇，人们总会憧憬美好，这就是我们存在的意义。</p>\n<p data-pid=\"Fc3foeG2\">让美好的梦，照进现实，让自然的美，疗愈人心。</p>\n<p data-pid=\"aj6K44jW\">天已经亮了，用《摇曳露营△》第一季ED「冬日和（ふゆびより）」中的一句歌词结尾吧，祝你露营愉快！</p>\n<blockquote data-pid=\"xReUukn3\">\n 平日里的生活 总是步履不停\n <br>在这里稍事休憩也无妨<br>繁星浩淼 星光流转<br>那温柔的景色 包裹着我们的心灵</br></br></br>\n</blockquote>\n<p data-pid=\"f3WyCgAp\">晚安！ </p>\n<hr>\n <p data-pid=\"oErHe8Ri\"><b>参考资料：</b></p>\n <p data-pid=\"bLISFQ1n\">1、<a
